alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 1:29PM PDT until October 26 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM WEDNESDAY TO 11 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in northern Elko county and 4 to 10 inches in the Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 5 PM Wednesday to 11 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
